title: NYC FC Soccer Fans Bemoan Home Playoff Game Away From Home
text:
Fans of New York City’s professional soccer team NYC FC should have been reveling, as their first-place team started the playoffs on Wednesday. But a number of supporters were miffed that the game was being played 10 miles from where it should be.

NYC FC plays its home games in the Bronx at Yankee Stadium, which it shares with the borough’s baseball team. With the Yankees playing into the postseason and having first rights to the field, the stadium wasn’t ready to host NYC FC’s home game against Toronto FC. Instead, the match...
description: NYC FC’s loss, which ended the season, means fans won’t have to deal with displacement from their home stadium for now. But the scheduling problem with the Yankees isn’t about to go away.
